text: visvasigale, saitanana hejje gurutugalannu anusarisabedi. Saitananu tanna hejjegurutugalannu anusarisuvavarige anaitika hagu dusta kelasagalannu adesisuttane. Nim'ma mele allahana anugraha hagu avana krpe illade iddiddare, nim'malli yarobbaru endigu sud'dha siladavaragi ulidiruttiralilla. Nijavagi allahane tanicchisidavarannu sud'dhavagiduttane mattu allahanu ellavannu keluvavanu hagu ellavannu ballavanagiddane
